content: color mosaic a brilliant collection of colors come together to form a mosaic of shapes a simple blanket to knit all garter stitch which results in a complex geometric design a great project to use with scrap yarns inspiration for this design comes from a crochet pattern by rachele carmona color story motif this post on her cypress textiles site has a wonderful description of her own inspiration and color selections ©sonia savoulian 2025 page 1 of 7 color mosaic yarn i used aran weight yarns both paintbox simply aran and stylecraft special aran any yarn can be used for this project just adjust for the desired size and gauge yarn amounts used shapes 1 & 4 4g shapes 2 & 3 11g shape 5 16g shape 6 6g i am not very fussy about selecting colors i aim for don t place similar colors next to each other balance light and dark colors distributed throughout the blanket needles/notions us 9 5 50mm knitting needles tapestry needle to weave in ends figure 1 block shapes gauge 16 stitches 32 row to 4 10cm using garter stitch finished size 47 120cm square techniques required weave in ends for garter stitch https //www youtube com/watch v=p05xkbq0-r0 pick up stitches along straight garter edge used for shape 5 https //www youtube com/watch v=tbwex0ja-im sewing blocks together https //www youtube com/watch v=h_fcdoxwhym pick up stiches along diagonal garter edge used for border https //www youtube com/watch v=ntf7sd8e1dk abbreviations bobble bind off k knit k2tog knit two stitches together decrease kfb knit front and back increase rs right side sts stitches ws wrong side ©sonia savoulian 2025 page 2 of 7 color mosaic instructions note each shape stripe of color has 16 garter ridges shape 1 row 1 rs using color 1 cast on 1 sts row 2 ws k1 row 3 kfb k to end of row row 4 k to end of row row 5-32 repeat row 3 and 4 a total of 14 times 16 sts shape 2 row 33-64 switch to color 2 continue repeating row 3 and 4 a total of 16 times 32 sts note before switching to color 3 refer to notes for sewing blocks together about seaming and leaving long tails shape 3 row 65 switch to color 3 k to end of row note no decrease in this row 32 sts row 66 k to end of row row 67 k2tog k to end of row row 68 k to end of row row 69-96 repeat row 67 and 68 a total of 14 times 17 sts shape 4 row 97-128 switch to color 4 continue repeating row 67 and 68 a total of 16 times 1
